description: A horse, bull, and pig stand over the body of a farmer lying face down on the ground next to a pitchfork. The animals' expressions suggest grim satisfaction or finality. This scene presents a dark and absurd twist on traditional farm narratives, implying the animals have somehow overcome or disposed of their owner. The farmer is identifiable by his straw hat and clothing. The presence of the pitchfork near the body is notable.
caption: "Old McDonald had a farm, eeyi-eeyi-yo ..."
